page.title: 16The Children of Herm, page 2
page.content: My name is Joel Richard Evans. I live in Belvoir House in Herm, the second smallest of the Channel Islands. There are four people in my family. My dad is the island carpenter and my mum is the manageress of the beach cafes. My brother Jake comes to school with me. My name is Tom Stenhouse. My daddy is an engineer. I live up the road from school. My family has four people and one dog called Paddy. My name is Faith Bagnall. I live just up the road from the school. My daddy works on the farm, he milks the cows. My mummy is the school cleaner. My brother Thomas has just started school. There are three babies in Herm, Patrick Yates, Tammy Crawford and Phillip Parkes.
